name: Space Shifter (Mauro Juarez Ariño, fdeschant)
description:
Team Name

Ayden Games

Gameplay Instructions
R2 to speed forward
L2 to speed backward
R1 to use speed burst
L1 to use free flow
Left analog to rotate
Circle to shift between worlds

Team Members
Mauro Juarez Ariño (Programmer & VFX Artists) - maurojuarezarino@gmail.com
Federico De Schant (Programmer & Game Designer) - fdeschant@gmail.com
Romulo Gandolfo (3D/2D Artist) - romugandolfo@hotmail.com

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.

Asteroids

Fire textures and base particle systems
